title: Rapid screening of toxicity to thermotolerant yeasts: inhibition of growth and fermentation by ionic liquids and zwitterions
content:
RSC Sustain., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4SU00239C, Paper

Mayu Shibata, Ayumi Hachisu, Souta Uemori, Hitomi Tobe, Kazuaki Ninomiya, Kosuke Kuroda
We here established rapid screening methods for toxicity of zwitterions and investigated the toxicity to growth and fermentation.
